website_summaries.verdict: The best pick available for consumers. It handles most jobs for a good price, and is powerful.
pros: 65.2 cc engine really moves the air for quick cleanups
Has a compelling list of features including emission-reducing X-Torq, adjustable fan speed, and comfortable harness
cons: Challenging to start at times, and pretty heavy

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS*
customer_reviews.text: As posted by other owners, this blower is a monster (it does enjoy gulping fuel however) .. i should have purchased it 30 years ago when i bought the house .. i'm sorry i wasted my money on the EGO 575 blower, which is OK for small jobs but nowhere near compares to this 360BT ! .. P.S. buy the Husqvarna hearing protectors too .. it is also very comfortable to 'wear' with the cushy shoulder pads & waist belt .. buy the six pack of Husky oil too at the same time and extend your warranty from 2 to 3 years!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. ginski

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING MOVES AIR!!! - and everything else.
customer_reviews.text: We live on a 1/4 acre surrounded by a forest of pines, oaks and maples in Maine. Additionally, the way the wind blows, our yard grabs the leaves from several other homes. For years, I had been using a high-power, 2-stroke hand held blower for years + a rake and a tarp. Worked fine, but wanted something faster. This 360BT moves a TON of air ... cleaned the entire yard of WET leaves (front and back) in less than an hour, PLUS pushed back (about 5') years of leaf build up that was accumulating around the backyard forest parameter because the previous blower wasn't powerful enough to push the leaves deep into the woods. VERY HAPPY with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Best I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes my stihls look like a wefare case. I have older redmax blowers and huskys too , totally refined unit. Bought 3 more to replace my stihls units. Would buy again hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Seriously--Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower is a monster. Unreal power--shaved a day and a half off of my days of raking and hauling and shamed my old gas hand held blower. No joke cleared about an acre of uneven yard in about 90 minutes, just blew it all way back into the woods. Only regret is that I waited 3 years to buy this machine. My neighbors pay $800+ to have their lawns cleared so I figure I am already way ahead. Took about 15 minutes to set up and get running out of the box. Started on one pull and ran smooth as all heck. One recommendation, make sure to get ear protection! You will not be disappointed with this blower.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a beast but hard to start
customer_reviews.text: Works like a beast - can move even wet leaves. So much better than an electrical one. At first it started easily, but after the 3rd time I used it, it wouldn't start unless I sprayed starter fluid into the carburetor. It feels a little heavy at first, but after using it a few times it doesn't seem that bad; the backpack design allows for easy control of the blower. It's worth the $400 because my lawn service wanted to charge me $750 for a fall clean-up and they only come out once, so if more leaves fall it would cost even more. Very glad I purchased this blower.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Holubowicz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Having recently shifted to a 1 acre property that is wooded along the side and back, I found my long-time handheld leaf blower inadequate. I researched and decided on the Husqvarna 360BT and am very pleased with my purchase. It came as advertised and assembled quickly and easily. The ease of use and power are amazing. I am now able to move the leaves past the clumps of honeysuckle and deep into the wooded area. The backpack unit and controls are well designed and actually less straining than my (much smaller) handheld unit.
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the performance of this leaf blower. I had been looking at different reviews, prices and specs for a long time. Made the mistake of taking the cheap option a couple years ago and tried to get by thinking that was just how it would be. Man was I ever wrong, this was a game changer. Leaves, sticks, walnuts, and even the wicked witch are no match. No issues with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: frog

customer_reviews.title: its not lite
customer_reviews.text: I like everything, I'm a 71 year man who is over weight, but I can strap it own and blow the hell out of leaves and pine needles. starts easy and runs great but it is not a lite weight.
customer_reviews.author: Roadhawg

customer_reviews.title: big and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: There comes a time when bigger is better and in the case of a great blow job I strongly recommend the husqvarna 360bt she is a beast! Upon receiving and after so foreplay and assembly I took this girl to the streets, eh my driveway that is and fired her up! Not having the greatest of driveway I did expect a little gravel ad some blacktop to come up, however to my surprise this little bugger ripped the blacktop up like it was rolling carpet up! So to sum up if you get lots of leaves and have a med sized yard this is the best blower for the job!
customer_reviews.author: norm davis

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from handheld
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with this Husq over the Echo because my Husq hand held has been so good to me over the years. I needed something bigger for my acre plus of heavy wooded land. I decided to go with a backpack instead of a walk behind because I can direct the air to certain locations where a walk behind can not. This machine has a lot of power BUT i expected a little more. It has cut my time in half
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sal

customer_reviews.title: Only one for heavy duty use
customer_reviews.text: This Husq blower is excellent. Yes pricey but if you are using weekly or a professional and moving heavy, accumulated leaf falls over 1-2 acres like I am, the 600 cfm is the only one to buy. I am once again king of my forest!! Started easy, great power, comfortable on the back. Easy on and easy to carry. Buy 50:1 pre-made fuel and enter the 21st century. Its loud as expected with this power but no problem with ear muffs as you should always use with any gas power tool. If small yard and/or moderate leaves buy the smaller units.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Moved leaves as expected
customer_reviews.text: I mostly bought it to blow out my gutters. I did that. Is it better than a homelite, I don't know. I wished I could reach down farther with the pipe when on the roof. I guess I will look for an adapter one day. As with any small engine, it will probably have issues with the carburetor due to being put up most of the time with alcohol in the gas. I should have purchase ethanol free gasoline.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blower
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this blower. The power is perfect. We have a wooded acre so we have a lot of leaves. This is our second season using this blower and it is awesome. We use it for Spring and Fall clean up. We use it in the Summer after heavy winds or rains. This blower has serious power and I can use it or my husband. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Moni4u2nv

customer_reviews.title: It really BLOWS!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s early in ownership to make a quality review and also not fall yet. Bought to blow away grass clippings after I mow and blow leaves into the woods in the fall. Shipping was right on time, setup was simple. Started on the 3rd pull. Isles at quite a low rpm. Has a large fuel cell. Took almost a gallon to fill it. Straps are padded and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alroundj

customer_reviews.title: Leaf Blower
customer_reviews.text: This is a very expensive Leaf Blower. Does not have a cold back, as others. Is Very Loud. Placement of the Primer Bulb IS stupid. Very Poor placement. Not satisfied with this $$$$ blower, should have gotten an Echo.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought it along time ago
customer_reviews.text: Tons of power. Easy on gas. I debated a long time to spend this type of money on a blower but I do not regret it. Should have bought it along time ago. The only thing I don't like about it is the kill switch location.
customer_reviews.author: Kchopper

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Blows the competition away.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a damaged goods deal for more than $100.00 off new price. There was no discernible damage to the machine. The original box had a damaged corner. The Machine is awesomely powerful. I've seen professionals with lawn care companies using them and have wanted one for years, but they were a bit too pricey for me. Now I have one and I'll never give it up. I have 0.6 acre wooded lot that has 30+ mature trees on and surrounding it. This baby literally blows the leaves away LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lamberti

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since the ball point pen
customer_reviews.text: The 360BT is an awesome machine! I have a smaller backpack that I used for years, when it died I purchased this one. I noticed a difference immediately! I am on 5 acres with cottonwoods and oaks. Wet leaves are no problem. The blower cut my cleanup time in half. I told my wife that I should have gotten this blower years ago. You have to be careful, it will blow rocks and mulch around. I actually blew a log out of the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: David Minkwitz

customer_reviews.title: Love it more than the last one
customer_reviews.text: Love it more than the last one. Lifted 3 inches of leaves from last fall that had been rained on the 2 days before with no problem. Old 145BT was 14 years old and never changed spark plug but upgraded to the 360BT. Old one went to son in law. Oldest of 5 Husqvarna product 20" chain saw 18 years old and never had a problem with any of them. Snow blower is next!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth farish

customer_reviews.title: What leaves!?
customer_reviews.text: Last year I spent the better part of two days with a handheld blower, tarp and rake trying to clear just my lawn and driveway. The amount of leaves I get every year deterred me from cutting back into the woods and extending my yard. This year I spent all that time with a chainsaw and only a couple hours with this backpack blower on moving leaves. It’s flat out amazing. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to save time with leaf cleanup. Had all the power you could ever need, pretty sure if you attached it to a small child you could launch them into orbit. If I could give it more than 5 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Headley

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for a year now. It starts up super easily!! It's comfortable to wear. I wear it for about 1.5hrs at a time. The power of this thing is super impressive. I have 3 acres and a ton of trees and this does the job great. I would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zachri S.

customer_reviews.title: Good blower.
customer_reviews.text: Husband tried it today and says it works well. This one replaces the one that was stolen from our shed. Highly recommend this for power. It makes it easy to clean up the yard from leaves and small debris.
customer_reviews.author: D Redding

customer_reviews.title: A step in the Right Direction
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase, previously was using a smaller and older model that did the job but with this model, the power is much greater and allows me to do my thing quicker and more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Husqvarna blower
customer_reviews.text: If you have a large yard, this is the machine for you. Works great, only need one swipe. Does not feel overly heavy to carry around. We have 3 properties to take care of and using this machine is a lot faster than the smaller blower or yikes - raking by hand.
customer_reviews.author: B. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Although I purchased open box- stating being mark on side and strap. It arrived with broken pieces. Obviously not inspected before shipped. Other then that it is heavy but managed to move leaves that were wet with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissyshoptx

customer_reviews.title: Problem product
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful blower once you get it started. After I had this blower for a few moths it worked fine. I didn't used it during the winter (Jan-Mar). When I tried to use the blower in April it would not start. I took it to a Husqvarna dealer and I was told that problem part was out of warranty. I could have it serviced or buy the new part which was almost the cost of a new blower. I had it serviced and it worked fine for a few starts and I was right back to it not starting.
customer_reviews.author: robert johnson

customer_reviews.title: This
customer_reviews.text: Really really good machine... Wanted really great machine that would completely WOW me and this didn't do that. Too bad because I was really hoping it would
customer_reviews.author: stevn mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Husqvarna what’s not to like
customer_reviews.text: Easy to start easy to carry. I have a shoulder problem and this is big so I put it on a picnic table or get help to put it on but once it’s on it’s great. Easy to control and lot’s of power.
customer_reviews.author: Warren F Halt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 acres of property in a forest, tons of leaves and with work being busy I neglected the leaves in the fall and they all stuck and my previous blower wasn't doing it. In 1 hour I did 10x's the work that I did in 4 hours with my hand held blower.
customer_reviews.author: michael t.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful & Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower has tremendous power. Gets job done fast. Blow leaves all the way to the pickup pile without having to drag them on the tarp. Blows the stuck twigs and acorns out of the lawn. Blows large sticks too. All my outdoor power equipment is Husqvarna. High Quality. Works great. Lasts. Take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Delta1-3

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This moved heavy piles of wet and dry leaves easily, even piles of wet oak leaves. Easy to start too. Wish I bought one 5 years ago, so the old rake, tarp and drag process could have ended sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: Commercial grade blower for a fraction of the price!!!! Backpack makes it easy to carry, blower very powerful, easy for anyone to use. Love it, use every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: cidalia massih

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Got it for Xmas and started ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Got it for Xmas and started right up and used it to blow snow all winter long(central NH snow). Yet to use it on leaves!!!!! No chest strap and the manual says it does (and shows picture). Husqvarna 1-800 number says it does not?????
customer_reviews.author: nick jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Defective quality
customer_reviews.text: It would not work. We had to take it to a lawn professional for them to connect the trigger to the throttle. It costs us 40 dollars to have it fixed before we could even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Price

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very powerful. Blows leaves right into a pile to pick up. No raking required. Also dries my car in an instant after washing. Great blower.
customer_reviews.author: kathy nicastro

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and easy starting. Works great will be buying more husqvarna for my trailer instead of Stihl and echo. Tried something new as far as brand and I’m honestly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: jeffvimpeny

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Excellent price. We mow 125 yards a week. It's a beast.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Don't skimp on your man tools!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an absolute beast of a machine. I have an electric mower and electric leaf blower, this makes the electric leaf blower seem like a novelty kid toy. This bad boy is 60 cc of power! It sounds great too ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Busted
customer_reviews.text: Handle control innards busted up. Took to local Husqvarna shop and got it replaced under warranty. Fine ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: What a great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power . It can handle all kinds of debris and cuts works time significantly . I'm 65 years old and the only thing that's hard for me is putting it on, my husband has to assist. No issue taking it off though.
customer_reviews.author: kathy miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has good power and starts easily. Very satisfied with entire transaction!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product..
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!!! Unfortunately to heavy for wife to use ... but it makes my job so much easier..
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Lots O Power for Husqvarna 967144301 360BT Backpack Blower
customer_reviews.text: More power than I expected, I do expect to get years of trouble-free use from this blower.
customer_reviews.author: S & L

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to a point
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package and assembled easily. Filled the fuel, pulled the cord and the cord pulled out of the spindle. Had to pay $30.00 to get the pull cord redone. Great unit otherwise. Hoping to get a refund of some sort?
customer_reviews.author: John Shemeluk

customer_reviews.title: Backpack blower
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wish I would have got one sooner. Now I need to come up with a better leaf mulcher!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Blows
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great! Blows the leaves right off the trees! A little heavy but getting use to it. And of course, use hearing protection
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Excellent backpack blower.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints whatsoever. Powerful, starts up easily, comfortable to wear and operate. I like that this has a larger capacity gas tank than many other models. Definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: But it does a great job for me
customer_reviews.text: Works well, strong motor. A bit heavy and I have not quite got the straps adjusted quite right. But it does a great job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J

customer_reviews.title: Im in real estate business and use commercially. Very ...
customer_reviews.text: Im in real estate business and use commercially. Very strong machine but may be a little heavy for avg homeowner. Also bought the 350, much lighter and almost as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Best leaf blower I have used; very powerful and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs reliably, not quite as potent as I expected having used a similar displacement Stihl in the past.
customer_reviews.author: ObtuseGoose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent yard tool !
customer_reviews.text: This compact lightweight unit has unbelievable power. Starts easily, runs quietly, and will blow even wet leaves and mud. I used it to clean debris off our driveway and blew out the gutters too. It is as light as a little daypack. Every homeowner NEEDS one of these !
customer_reviews.author: jJan Karwat

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Was using a husqvarna 145bt. This 360bt literally blows the other away. Great unit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it for leaves in the fall, and then to blow off dry snow in the winter to set field decoys!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Harder

customer_reviews.title: Cuts down on time
customer_reviews.text: A little bit on the heavy side but will do the job without hesitation or losing power.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. Saves so much time compared to raking or paying someone to do it! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Handles all jobs with ease
customer_reviews.text: Has great power, starts right up every time. I recommend wearing ear muffs. It is very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Avi8tor

customer_reviews.title: Power and air volume way better then hand held
customer_reviews.text: It likes the fuel, I see where alot of folks like to buy the premixed fuel, you will go broke if you use it alot. Runs great and makes previously hard and long jobs alot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Pat romero

customer_reviews.title: Blows strong
customer_reviews.text: Blows strong. I think it could double as a snow blower
customer_reviews.author: Fanazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blower!
customer_reviews.text: Great blower all around. Starts up easy every time cold or not.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Worth it - treat yourself!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I made - use this thing for everything around the yard. Handheld blowers are worthless compared to this.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Runs great, starts easily, moves a lot of air. That's all I have to say about that.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power for wet heavy leaves Hard to start cold but haven’t had chance to check if choke is working properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Backpack Leaf Blower is Great! Bought it for my Fiancé and he absolutely loves it. Great Power and gets the job done quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to start works well once running
customer_reviews.text: Works well blowing leaves and light snow. Difficult to start. Need to use starting fluid almost all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have back issues and this is easier to use than I expected. Glad I listened to my friend who said I couldn’t go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great yard tool.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a big yard with trees, this is a great choice. Very powerful!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Starts easy, runs like a top, and is well balanced. This is the real Husqvarna.
customer_reviews.author: Mill

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, I’m a gardener so by the end of the day feels heavy but it makes my job easier I liked
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but excellent
customer_reviews.text: This blower is exceptional at blowing leaves and small twigs. I have an acre of land and it handles the job of clean up in half the time it took with my old blower.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander King

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blower. Very powerful and heavy duty. Put my other to shame
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blower
customer_reviews.text: Great for all day leaf blowing. Starts 2 or less pulls
customer_reviews.author: RobertJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great blower for the price almost 200.00 less than comparable stihl
customer_reviews.author: carol allen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes hard to start - even tho under 40 hours on it.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as others in the same price range , doesn’t start easy even when using the Husqvarna reckoned gas mixture and goes through gas very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aggressive machine
customer_reviews.text: Blowing huge amounts of leaves through the woods. Very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack Blower
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, started with just a couple of pulls, and I was very pleased with its blowing power... I would recommend this backpack blower.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Power
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.. Used 3x in 1 week and starts easy every time, plenty of power. Time will tell but so far very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David F

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pricey but worth it. Good backpack carries the weight well. Helps get the job done faster. Solid quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Ben T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Works great. This thing is a monster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best leaf blower hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Wow... i wasted years of tome using inadequate blowers.. never again.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Romesberg

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Missing user manual and clamps to secure hose, no packaging in the box to protect product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Markz (New York)

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start and powerfull
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is a little heavy, but as a backpack you really don't notice .
customer_reviews.author: John F. Abraham

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️BEAST
customer_reviews.text: I have a husqvarna weed eater with the old trimmer plus blower head and a big rake. it took the whole day with someone helping me!! it was too time consuming, mind you my property isn't a 1/2 acre. It took time getting use to because you can't switch hands. But other than that it's a BEAST when it comes to blowing 🍃 It should have been named 🍃 sweeper 360BT.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the blower. It's got the power to get the work done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, worth the $$.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited this long. Powerful unit that saves me valuable time in the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wind speed, and control of leaves and debris.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great right out of the box and I put 15 hours into the machine already.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Schuessler

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the fast service and the Blower works great
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Waldeck

customer_reviews.title: It always starts and the amount of air it blows terrific. I would buy another one if I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for about three years and have had no problems at all. It always starts and the amount of air it blows terrific. I would buy another one if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is powerful and save me a time in removing the fallen leaves from my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Keh

customer_reviews.title: Great blower!
customer_reviews.text: Great blower, a little heavy, but had a huge gas tank.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Willson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Have 600ft driveway and this blower makes it a piece of cake! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Prhunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband was beyond pleased when we bought this for him !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly impressed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is freaking awesome. I bought the 130BT first and quickly realized it was not powerful enough to handle all the white oak leaves that would be in my yard come fall. I went ahead and order this one and it literally blew me away how powerful this thing is. Invest in ear muffs also, it is extremely loud.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Rock you like a hurricane....
customer_reviews.text: It is like having a hurricane on your back. Period!
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and easy starting
customer_reviews.text: Heavy but powerful - I'll take powerful every time. Easy set up and easy starting! Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: John DeBono

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to start, great power, not too heavy. Meets all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hardaway Wright

customer_reviews.title: powerfull
customer_reviews.text: stop looking and buy it.this thing is powerfull .i swear it will take the paint off your house.it will blow good size stones off your driveway.its worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for heavy tree seed pods
customer_reviews.text: Excellent on our difficult & heavy tree seed pods, and makes leaf clean up a snap by cutting clean up time down by 75%
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made in a long time. Can't wait to use it again in the spring. Comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: judy

product_meta.title: Husqvarna 967144301 360BT Backpack Blower, Orange
product_meta.description: The Husqvarna 360BT is a powerful commercial-style backpack blower designed for demanding tasks. X-Torq engine for excellent performance, good fuel economy and low emissions. High air speed combined with large air flow gives sufficient capacity for most jobs. Comfortable, wide shoulder straps and adjustable handle with cruise control. Professional-style air filter for trouble free use.
feature_bullets: Powerful commercial-style backpack blower designed for demanding tasks. X-Torq engine for excellent performance, good fuel economy and low emissions. High air speed combined with large air flow gives sufficient capacity for most jobs
X-TORQ ENGINE: The X-Torq engine design reduces harmful exhaust emissions by up to 60 Percent and increases fuel efficiency by up to 20 Percent
UTILIZE FULL BLOW FORCE WITH MINIMAL ARM STRAIN: The offset handle makes the blow forces easier to control by preventing the arm from being pulled downwards
HIGH BLOWING CAPACITY: The powerful and easy to start X-Torq engine in combination with efficient fan design delivers high air speed and air flow.Maximum power speed:8100 rpm
AIR PURGE: Removes air from carburetor and fuel system for easy starting
